resource.string: Query or modify the value of MSISDN

Usage:
{}$ {} [id=xx] [name=xxxx] [num=xxxx]
Example: - msisdn MSISDN records: > #1: Name: NULL (14 Bytes), Num: 0928000000 (FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF 06 81 90 82 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF FF FF FF)
> #2: Name: (14 Bytes), Num: (FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF)
- msisdn id=2 name=Orange num=+886919001122 MSISDN records: > #1: Name: NULL (14 Bytes), Num: 0928000000 (FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF 06 81 90 82 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF FF FF FF)
> #2: Name: (14 Bytes), Num: (FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF)
Updated MSISDN records: > #2: Name: Orange (14 Bytes), Num: +886900111222 (4F 72 61 6E 67 65 FF FF FF FF FF FF FF FF 08 91 88 96 00 11 21 22 FF FF FF FF FF FF)
PS. 1. In update operation, the 'id' parameter is mandatory. 2. In update operation, only one record can be modification.
